#include<iostream>
#include<map>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int tc,n,i,j,nn;
    long int num,ans;
    cin >> tc;
    map<int , long int> mp;

    while(tc--){
        cin >> n;

        if(n%2==0){
           nn = n/2;
        }else{
            nn = n/2 + 1;
        }

        for(i=0;i<n;i++){
            cin >> num;
            mp[num]++;
        }

        map<int , long int>::iterator it = mp.begin();
        long int max =0;
        for(;it!=mp.end();it++){
          if(it->second >= nn){
            if(it->second > max){
                max = it->second;
                ans = it->first;
            }
          }
        }

        cout << ans <<endl;
    }
}
